item.title: John Piper Crossway Legacy ESV
item.description: john-piper-esv This picture popped up on my facebook feed. It shows John Piper with a Crossway Thinline Heirloom ESV. 8pt font, double column, this is slightly smaller than my 9.5pt font, single column heirloom legacy. Both have the goatskin leather.
